mapper.select: SELECT detail.fid,detail.name,detail.img,detail.price,detail.amount FROM orders,detail WHERE orders.oid = detail.oid AND orders.oid = #{oid}
SELECT SUM(detail.price*detail.amount) total_price FROM orders,detail WHERE orders.oid = detail.oid AND orders.oid = #{oid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders (uid, name, tel, address) VALUES(#{uid},#{name},#{tel},#{address})
INSERT INTO detail (oid, fid, name, img, price, amount) VALUES(#{oid},#{fid},#{name},#{img},#{price},#{amount})
